sentence.Network_en: I spent many hours mindlessly banging a tennis ball against the wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 我好几个小时都在机械地往墙上打网球。

sentence.Network_en: I was annoyed with myself for having so quickly and mindlessly lost thirty dollars.
sentence.Network_cn: 我恨自己怎么会这么快就傻乎乎地损失了30美元。

sentence.Network_en: If you eat mindlessly, you will most likely overeat.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是盲目地吃, 很可能会吃得过多.

请问catalog of gadgets在这里是什么意思？... ... catalog of gadgets 产品目录 mindlessly 盲目地 n. 常去；求助[凭借]的.
同事沟通Communicating... ... Thanks for saying that. 谢谢你这样说。 mindlessly adj. 没有头脑地 lose one's temper 发脾气.

list.abs: If you eat mindlessly , you will most likely overeat ., 你要是盲目地吃 , 很可能会吃得过多.
I don ' t mindlessly heap praise on Nausicaa ., 我并没有刻意在堆积对 < 风之谷 > 的赞美.
Is this an example of mindlessly aping Western lifestyles ?, 这是一个盲目模仿西方生活方式的例子么?

entry.def: If you describe a violent action as mindless, you mean that it is done without thought and will achieve nothing.

example.ex: ...a plot that mixes blackmail, extortion and mindless violence.
example.tran: 集合了敲诈勒索和盲目暴力的故事情节

entry.tran: 愚蠢的;无知的;不动脑子的
entry.def: If you describe a person or group as mindless, you mean that they are stupid or do not think about what they are doing.

example.ex: She wasn't at all the mindless little wife so many people perceived her to be.
example.tran: 她绝对不是许多人认为的那种愚蠢的小媳妇。

entry.tran: 单调乏味的;无需动脑筋的
entry.def: If you describe an activity as mindless, you mean that it is so dull that people do it or take part in it without thinking.

example.tran: 一些工作中的机械重复

sentences.sentence: "all day long, he mindlessly filled out forms"
"these temples were mindlessly destroyed by the Red Guards"

auth_sentence.content: Please verify statements before you mindlessly repeat them.
